EmailTemplate.name: LE-03-14-202203-HHS-ENT-SEVT-HIMSS22.Pre Event Invite 1
EmailTemplate.subject: See what's new in virtual care at HIMSS
EmailTemplate.textOnly: Meet us at HIMSS22 March 14-18, 2022 Orlando, FL Teladoc Health offers hospitals and health systems a full spectrum of virtual care solutions powered by technology and data to improve healthcare delivery at scale. If you’re attending HIMSS22, we invite you to schedule a meeting <[[https://calendly.com/teladochealth-marketingevents/himss-2022-strategy-session-with-teladoc-health?month=2022-01]]> or stop by booth 4449 <[[https://himss22.mapyourshow.com/8_0/floorplan/?hallID=W&selectedBooth=booth~4449]]> to hear more about our enterprise virtual care offering. Support for every clinical setting and use case: High-acuity care like stroke and emergent solutions Personalized solutions for chronic care management Inpatient solutions that create patient care efficiencies Unified, integrated virtual care platform powered by Solo with Microsoft Teams Presentation: Lessons Learned from Launching a Virtual Nursing Unit Be sure to attend our educational speaking session on Tuesday, March 15th at 4:15 p.m. to hear how Saint Luke’s Health System leveraged virtual care to serve their inpatient population and help alleviate their nurse staffing challenges. Learn more https://www.himss.org/global-conference/session-lessons-learned-launching-virtual-nursing-unit About Teladoc Health Teladoc Health is empowering all people everywhere to live healthier lives by transforming the healthcare experience. Recognized as the world leader in whole-person virtual care, Teladoc Health leverages clinical expertise, advanced technology and actionable data insights to meet the evolving needs of consumers and healthcare professionals. Unsubscribe <[[https://go1.teladochealth.com/subscriptions.html]]> | Privacy <[[https://teladochealth.com/privacy-policy/]]> | Legal Notice <[[https://teladochealth.com/notice-of-non-discrimination/]]> ©Teladoc Health, Inc. All rights reserved. 2 Manhattanville Rd., Purchase, NY 10577
